name: The Great Fall of Humpty Dumpty (Marian Dumitriu)
name_original: The Great Fall of Humpty Dumpty (Marian Dumitriu)
description:
The Great Fall of Humpty Dumpty is my first game jam game. 

Catapult Humpty into the world to gain gold based on distance tossed. 

Spend gold at shop to Upgrade the catapult or character to gain even more gold.

This is was a group project so credits to: Marian Dumitriu, DevMaelstrom, Ewan & Rod.
